Motion

Defined in: src/Motion.hx:16

Summary

Class for shake(devicemotion) functionality.

Constructor

Motion

Defined in src/Motion.hx:16

Syntax

Motion

()

Summary

Example:

    var motion = new Motion();
    motion.shake(onShake);
    function onShake() {
        trace("shake detected");
  }
